directions: Completely melt the chocolate in a double boiler. Add the cream to a medium bowl and pour in the chocolate. Whisk the mixture very slowly creating a shiny, elastic emulsion.
Whisk in the butter, then add the liqueur, to taste, until well combined.
Pour the mixture into a fondue pot. Dip your choice of bites into the fondue using fondue forks and enjoy!
ingredients: 8 ounces good dark chocolate, chopped (not below 60 percent cocoa, recommended: Valrhona)
Marshmallows, strawberries, pound cake, dried apricot/mango/papaya, for serving
title: Chocolate Fondue
